name: com.gavriktonio.smartvariables
description:
Smart variables package based on Scriptable objects.
Connect scripts not through code, but by assigning variables, stored outside of scripts.
Storing variables in assets allows for having globally accessible variables
A local collection allows to store variables on an instance of an object in case it needs to be duplicated when copied.

samples.description: Simple samples showing how to set up and use smart variables
